title: Increase in Burglaries in Allen Co Over Past Few Weeks
content:
Posted Thursday, September 10th 2015 @ 10am 
 
Lima , OH (WIMA) -- An increase in burglaries and theft complaints is being reported by Allen County Sheriff Sam Crish. 
 
  
 
In a press release- the Sheriff said reports are not confined to one area- 
 
but many of the recent offenses have happened on the east side of the 
 
county. 
 
  
 
Property owners should call 419-227-3535 if they notice any suspicious activities 
 
near their homes.
